settings.title: Alfa Laval Sani
settings.content:
Engineered for hygienic applications, Toftejorg Rotary spray head tank cleaning devices offer exceptional cleanability and drainability and easy, cost-effective maintenance.

  • The Alfa Laval SaniMicro is designed to clean tanks from 0.05 â€“ 1 m3.
  • The Alfa Laval SaniMidget is designed to clean tanks from 1 - 10 m3.
  • The Alfa Laval SaniMagnum is designed to clean tanks from 5 - 40 m3.

The Alfa Laval Sani series minimizes the consumption of water and cleaning media. Easy to customize to meet customer requirements and allows companies to spend less time cleaning and more time producing.
settings.button_text: Click here to find your product

settings.title: As an Alfa Laval master distributor we cover the full range of rotary spray heads from Alfa Laval - just reach out!
settings.html:
• Multi: Multi range are engineered for industrial application, such as pulp & paper, chemical, steel and starch.
  • Sani: Sani range are engineered for hygienic, such as food, dairy and beverage applications.
  • Sani SB: Sani SB are designed and certified and autohorized to carry the 3A symbol.

settings.title: Looking for other products or need help to select the right product?
settings.content: We cover the full range of Alfa Laval products and our experts are ready to support you in selecting the right product for your needs - so do not hesitate to reach out!
